snippet: Minutes from the Fed’s latest meeting indicated that the central bank supports removing some thresholds that would prompt a policy tightening.
abstract: Stock market rallies after minutes from Federal Reserve's policy meeting show that the central bank was more supportive of keeping interest rates very low.
lead_paragraph: Minutes from the Fed’s latest meeting indicated that the central bank supports removing some thresholds that would prompt a policy tightening.

headline.main: Market Rallies After Federal Reserve Hints That It Will Keep Interest Rates Low
headline.print_headline: Market Rallies After Federal Reserve Hints That It Will Keep Interest Rates Low
